role: Software Engineer | Android and iOS Native Developer
details: Started journey with a 6-month internship and then appointed as a Software Engineer to develop native Android and iOS mobile applications. I got opportunity to work on real world projects such as Drone Control (Android) app, Vring (Android and iOS), OneCloud connect(Android and iOS), etc. Hands on practice with architecture patterns, design patterns and code principles. I have built and maintained open-source libraries to make sure I deliver consistent and reliable code.
